name: GodotBot's Gravity
description:
GodotBot's Gravity

A simple platformer with a planetary twist

Made for Trijam #162: Its All Connected

The aim of the game is to reach the goal at the end of each level, collecting enough of the collectables along the way.

Due to time constraints the game has:

- Only 3 Levels

- 2 Assets

- No death code (must be restarted if killed by an enemy)
